website_summaries.verdict: Customers wanting a clear container will find their match in this reliable product with unique airtight technology.
pros: While other containers still trap air inside with the coffee, this product releases all air through its clever push-down vent system
Clear design complements almost any kitchen space
cons: Some buyers had problems with the glass breaking

customer_reviews.title: Please be careful handling this
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for coffee beans. Keeps them a bit fresher than just leaving them in the bag and also looks a lot nicer on the countertop than the bag Update: just nearly cut my hand in half on this thing. Was pulling the plunger/lid upward and the top half of the container shattered. I'm not the hulk. Please be careful handling this
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M Rumpf

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Handle broke apart within a week--it simply separated into two pieces during normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowsmith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Coffee Beans
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum storage container. It looks great on the counter. The lid forms a vacuum seal and is very easy to use. Coffee beans will stay fairly fresh as long as you don't have direct light hitting the container. Not sure how long the seal will last but if I ever have to submit a claim, I'm hoping prepara's customer service & warranty match the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: P120D1GY

customer_reviews.title: I swear I purchased a counterfeit product.
customer_reviews.text: I received an Evac canister as a gift and loved it, so I purchased another from Amazon. What a disappointment. The rubber collar is so loose that it drops down into the canister. On closer inspection, the Evac logo is a printed sticker, unlike the etched logo on my original product. I swear this is a knock off product. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Blanche H.

customer_reviews.title: Not for Larger Hands
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this one the keep our coffee fresh. The design and look are sleek for certain & I think the product will serve our needs well, but a little more thought - especially for the price paid - needs to go into design improvements, since only I will be able to use them. This model isn't wide enough for my husband's hands - the Diameter being only 3-3/4" wide. Hopefully I can find that they have larger-diameter glass canisters.
customer_reviews.author: RadsGirl

customer_reviews.title: Small is perfect for 5-6oz coffee, works as described
customer_reviews.text: I love to do small batch coffee roasting, and these are way more convenient than messing with ziplock bags each time I want to get some coffee out. I got 2 at $14 each, I'd say it was a steal! I also have the more expensive $30 Airscape (big size). I think the size small in this brand is easier to pull up/push down the handle each time, since the max coffee I store per variety is < 6 oz. Beyond that you will need the medium size.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Great-looking airtight storage
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I wanted an airtight container to store my coffee beans but that also looks good and classy on my coffee station. Perfect! Bonus, you can cut the label off your coffee bag and slide it right inside without tape or glue or anything so you know what beans are what! Great buy! I have 3 mediums for whole beans, then a small for grounds.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Dagenais

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in May 2020 and absolutely loved this container for storing my coffee beans. It looked nice, and the lid makes an awesome sucking/whistling noise that made me smile every time I used it. Unfortunately, this morning after just 2 months of use the glass cracked when I took the lid off. No excessive force was used and I wasn’t pulling at an angle. I’m really bummed as I enjoyed this canister but now see that others have had trouble with the container cracking in the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great product but you can't fit a whole regular bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product but you can't fit a whole regular bag of coffee completely inside. I usually buy Costco coffee so it definitely wouldn't fit that so I refill it every now and then and keep the bigger bag in a ziploc in a dark cool area. Seems to keep it fresh enough. It does take the air out and I like the clear glass case but I wish I would have gotten the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Wada

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These are great storage containers. I tried them now for several weeks storing sugar. I have a problem with ants and if there was any sort of leak, I know the ants would have found it, and no ants as of today! Thanks for a great product! Sharon Green
customer_reviews.author: Kindred

customer_reviews.title: Great until it exploded.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great while we had it for a few months. But when we were pressurizing it which takes little force, it exploded. The air did not properly release. Glass all over our coffee bar and equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Haugen

customer_reviews.title: total waste of money and everything
customer_reviews.text: doesn't work - food gets stale. used it for sugar for coffee and moisture got in and turned the sugar into a block of stale yuck. very difficult to clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the jar and lid
customer_reviews.text: I like the jar and lid, seems solid, but not as higher end as they seem on add. The name on glass is a sticker, and the metal on bottom of lid is flimsy metal, that seems like it is going to scratch glass and make lines in glass down road after longer use. I feel like the all plastic lids would be a better choice to not worry about scratched glass.
customer_reviews.author: AJS

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love these jars. I keep finding reasons to buy more. Looks nice. I like the way the lid keeps everything compacted in the jar and the seals is better then I expected. Nice nice product and arrived very quickly. I'm sure I will find something else that I will need to order more for. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: JulBug32

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Coffee bean containers are simple in theory but after having several it's the little things that count. Great attention to the mechanics went into the plunger and it shows. This beats out my previous 4 coffee containers. Picky espresso drinkers, pull the trigger on this one.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: elegant
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it to store treats for my dogs. It's smaller than I expected but it gets the job done. Will order a larger one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Soul

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, but large
customer_reviews.text: For an average bag of beans, this handsome container is far too tall. It was the only size, so i went with it. Seems to seal well and the lid is easy to take off. Why not make smaller ones???
customer_reviews.author: sasha B

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things fresh
customer_reviews.text: I use these in different sizes for nuts and cereals. So much better because it keeps them so much fresher than normal containers that don't push out the air.
customer_reviews.author: londongirl

customer_reviews.title: F R E S H N E S S
customer_reviews.text: AN AMAZING PRODUCT. This thing keeps so many different kinds of things fresh. Coffee beans, dog kibble, cookies, tea, etc. It is also aesthetically pleasing on my counter and its nice to be able to see what i'm storing in it. The press down lid also can be quickly dismantled and cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Quetzalli Castro

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the medium size and it fits perfectly in my cabinet. It is well-constructed and attractive. Keeps the coffee fresh as the day you ground it up!
customer_reviews.author: QueenAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Must have for home barista
customer_reviews.text: Seals coffee really well, keeps aroma and coffee I use it for more than 2 years already and very satisfied. Must have for home barista corner.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: The perfect storage container
customer_reviews.text: While this container is somewhat on the small size, it is perfect for many things, and it seals perfectly - and it is extremely easy to use. I will definitely be buying more, and hopefully will be able to find some larger sizes from this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Broyles

customer_reviews.title: Simple and pretty design
customer_reviews.text: It is of very good quality. Very easy to clean and handle, I like the simple design, which looks very modern. I used it for my coffee beans, I will buy a bigger one for my tea.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaojiao

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Not the most aesthetically pleasing container, but works really well, does what it is supposed to do. I can't complain. My coffee is fresh and that is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H

customer_reviews.title: Just right for my coffee beans
customer_reviews.text: Lowering the lid does a great job of minimizing air in the container. Raising the lid is easy after the vacuum seal has broken. Beware, the jar is glass so rest it cautiously on hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: B. C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: The quality is solid! I have no complaints. The glass is even, round, transparent, and so forth. The cap is not planning to fall apart any time soon. Like the product. It feels good when you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed for Its Purpose
customer_reviews.text: This product does an excellent job of keeping expensive tea fresh. It us easy to open & seal. I judge this as a very well designed product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Nilsson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Too delicate
customer_reviews.text: This item broke before I could use it. I put in the dishwasher to clean. Upon insertion into the dishwasher, it broke. Glass is thin and not tough. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nyc guy

customer_reviews.title: Glass cracked after a month rendering the container useless.
customer_reviews.text: Went to grab some coffee beans after one month and the glass container was cracked. No idea how it happened as I’m the only one using the container.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Blitz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for coffee!
customer_reviews.text: We use these to store ground coffee and I'm always impressed with how fresh the coffee is day after day. They look sleek, too!
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I like that the stainless portion of the handle detaches for cleaning. The glass jar had a tiny imperfection (a little nick/excess), but it wasn't enough for me to send back. I will say that if you're not careful removing the lid, the stainless portion scraps against the glass :( Overall it works and I like the look and feel of it, but I did drop a star due to the scrapping mentioned above.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Coffee saver!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a little over a month now, and don't know how I managed without it! I use it for whole coffee beans, and coffee tastes just as fresh day 7 as it did on day 1! Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Guile

customer_reviews.title: can't find a replacement
customer_reviews.text: like others have said, does the job until it breaks, slight tap on the counter and it shattered. i am looking for glass replacement for the sealing cover and so far can't find one
customer_reviews.author: LAGF

customer_reviews.title: Not airtight especially for coffee beans which need to stay fresh
customer_reviews.text: It’s not airtight as described rubber gasket is lose on glass when pushing down and up on valve for suction
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Smart design - Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design and very durable materials. Keeps teh coffee fresh as day 1. Make sure to measure your cabinet height and buy the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Best PREMIUM Airtight Storage Container
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as gifts at Christmastime and they were a big hit! Coffee lovers loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: best storage ever
customer_reviews.text: Nothing, air or liquid, gets in or out but so easy to open and seal. So easy on the arthritic wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Sergent31563

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: The glass makes all the difference - love the style and the airtight top - a bit on the expensive side so am limited to what I can purchase, but do like what I have in the glass series. Well packaged and shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: LiteraryLady

customer_reviews.title: Great airtight lid and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean and the airtight lid is superb. Definitely the best coffee storage product I’ve purchased.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: First Class Product
customer_reviews.text: i have been looking for a product like this for a long while. it is superbly made... and i am a nit picker for detail... i just could not find fault with it. the seal is snug.. the workmanship on the lid and vacuum valves are first class.. the package arrived here in India , without breakage. I am impressed with this product and have ordered 8 bottles of the same.
customer_reviews.author: BURJOR BANAJI

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought all 3 sizes I love them so much. I use them for my coffee...beans and ground
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: i love this thing
customer_reviews.text: i love this thing. I love when I saw it win a red dot award, I loved it when I bought it, I love it every time I get coffee out of it. This one is a good size, but if you store more than 2 weeks of coffee at once, go for the bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: SmokeyTheBear

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Product is perfect for what we were looking for! Although, we did find a mysterious crack that goes down half the length of the container shortly after getting it. We are not sure what caused the crack (no dropping or hitting it with anything). Otherwise, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Schueler

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I had it on my kitchen counter and used for my coffee. The glass is fragile and poor quality. It cracked when I pull it the top out.
customer_reviews.author: DEDO

customer_reviews.title: Does not contain odors.
customer_reviews.text: Love them, easy to clean odors don't stick to the lid but odors do escape. Perfect size, got the med.
customer_reviews.author: victoria hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect and exactly what I need to store in an airtight container.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Roth

customer_reviews.title: Reminds me of chemistry equipment.
customer_reviews.text: I think these are really cool. The suction does spray the contents around, so I don't vacuum all the way down to the powder. It beats folding up coffee/tea bags with fasteners.
customer_reviews.author: TMA

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these to store my bird food pellets to keep them fresh. These are beautiful and work so great! VERY delicate.
customer_reviews.author: Erica_O

customer_reviews.title: Airtight jar!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jar! I really love the fact that you can put something large or small in it and the jar still seals vacuum tight. I highly recommend for any herbs you are trying to keep fresh.
customer_reviews.author: josephine surma

customer_reviews.title: fragile
customer_reviews.text: Mine broke within seven days of purchase. If you have rubber floors and counter then they might last.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very well thought out!
customer_reviews.text: Great canisters! The lid expels excess air up to the top of the product to reduce spoilage. (first of any canister that I have seen to have this technology) Very cool and they look great on the counter. Only draw back is that it is more difficult to remove the lid, but the pros outweigh the one con.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, broke second time using container.
customer_reviews.text: Second time I used the jar, a large “V” shaped piece broke out of it and now it’s trash. I thought it was going to be a quality product but obviously it’s not!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Thought I was getting a larger size like the one I broke. Handle is difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: June Cade

customer_reviews.title: Well built and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy glass that can take a surprising amount of abuse. If you're worried about fragility in the reviews of other glass containers, these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: Aegispsyche

customer_reviews.title: Glass not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: Used for a week, then pulling the lid off broken the glass container.
customer_reviews.author: Rob R.

customer_reviews.title: Get Something Different
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t keep the air out like it says with in a few days the contents were dried out and stale... Decided to pick up a mason jar with a air tight cap. This will probably be used for random screws & nails in the garage since it doesn’t do what’s it’s supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: ian klida

customer_reviews.title: oxygen purging glass jar
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot smaller than it looks you can't really put any thing in their with various sized items in it. I got it to keep my oxygen removers in and it leaks. I guess it would work a lot better if I could find a much larger one. Good idea though.
customer_reviews.author: Michele B.

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not convinced this works as advertised. The seal isn't tight and you can see agap between the glass and silicone seal. It looks nice, but that is really it. I won't purchases another one.
customer_reviews.author: corynne

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. It keeps whole bean coffee - freshly ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. It keeps whole bean coffee - freshly roasted and with oil on the beans, from drying out for a month or more. I'm glad I bought them. The Medium size does not quite hold a pound of beans, the Large does.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne the Shrink

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, just as I expected. I am using it to keep ground gourmet coffee. It's so tight that I actually have to exert a bit of effort in opening or lifting and closing. But that's me, retired baby boomer. After some months' use, I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Ramos Mattei

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks classy
customer_reviews.text: I was actually surprised to find the container was actually made out of glass. I purchased the dark chrome version which actually looks a little more like dark gold but still looks great. I'm storing some incredibly pungent "coffee beans" in this and when I hover my nose over the top, I barely smell anything. This won't fool a trained canine but it has keep my "coffee beans" fresh for several weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: Degen

customer_reviews.title: And it looks GREAT on my counter top
customer_reviews.text: The container works well. It keeps my coffee beans and mixed nuts fresh. And it looks GREAT on my counter top
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: The lid seal broke and separated from the handle after ...
customer_reviews.text: The lid seal broke and separated from the handle after a few months of usage. The company replaced it but I don't think it's going to last. Needs a redesign.
customer_reviews.author: LionsLatte

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this product out and used it with my coffee beans. They've kept fresh until I finished them (3 weeks) no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Castillo

customer_reviews.title: This works great. Seals very nicely and looks good
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Seals very nicely and looks good. Definitely get the glass container. It's a little hard to get it open but you get used to it and it just means it's getting sealed like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Casper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! I love these things! I have always struggled to find an airtight storage container for coffee beans and these work amazingly well! Very impressed and will definitely by buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Spitzhacke33

customer_reviews.title: Great form AND function
customer_reviews.text: Really terrific product - both function and sleek form. Price is about $3 less than grocery store where I first saw it. I make a mix of caf/decaf and store exactly 5 cups of beans when full. I think I have large size -about 11" tall.
customer_reviews.author: Barb at Bull Run

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Nice, simple mechanism for air-tight storage. Keeps the onion smell inside the container. Fill, empty, wash, rinse, repeat.
customer_reviews.author: Trude K. Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee fresh.......
customer_reviews.text: Love this but am careful in handling. Keeps my coffee fresh, which was my purpose for purchasing. It also looks great on my counter. I wouldn't want children around this.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Quality product that is easy to use and store, although the container is not totally capable of locking in smell
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Much much smaller than described. Upon opening I discovered the top of the lid (with the handle) wasn’t even adhered to the lower portion. I had to buy a tube of Gorilla glue to fix it. Otherwise it works and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: justsayin

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Better to buy size up from what ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Better to buy size up from what you need due to fact that lid takes up some space.
customer_reviews.author: VW Pete

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my coffee for about a year; the handle broke off of the cap and it's no longer usable. It is not a very good design.
customer_reviews.author: Onk

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Coffee Beans
customer_reviews.text: I love how this keeps my beans as fresh as possible before grinding for a great morning coffee brew.
customer_reviews.author: MansterRock1234

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but small.
customer_reviews.text: The product is a nice quality, but the description is seemingly off. The small (16oz) barely holds more than half a 12oz bag of coffee beans.
customer_reviews.author: Allen E

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my coffee fresh!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this keeps my coffee beans fresh! It’s fun to hear the wooshing sound as you press the lid down and the air is expelled. Nice clean appearance and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Super breakable glass
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase. Glass is very thin and broke after ONE day of using.
customer_reviews.author: Jerod Gummer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and looks good. Might be larger than you'll need so make sure to get the one you want
customer_reviews.author: DavidAllen44

customer_reviews.title: High quality / Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my dog food after I read that it shouldn't be stored in a plastic container. Yes, extravagant for the purpose... But does the job for my tiny dog and looks nice on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it to store my coffee after grinding. It keeps it fresh specially from our high humidity on the Texas coast.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Douris

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The best purchase I’ve made in ages. Buy it! It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall B

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Love this container , great vacume pressure for freshness !
customer_reviews.author: michelle ursino

customer_reviews.title: Storage Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different storage containers and these are superior in every way. I got two and like them so much I will buy more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Harmon

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR COFFEE
customer_reviews.text: PHOTOS ARE DECIEVING . NOT TRUE TO SIZE. WOULD NOT FIT A COMPLETE BAG OF COFFEE
customer_reviews.author: HECTOR VEGA

customer_reviews.title: Great airtight container.
customer_reviews.text: It’s smaller than I expected but fits a small bag of coffee exactly. So worked out. The design is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Anatoly Volovik

customer_reviews.title: It doesnt hold coffee well
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to store the coffee bean, but the aroma and smell of the coffee bean shortly flies. Somewhat more air contact. I do not use it right now.
customer_reviews.author: Hamza Ucar

customer_reviews.title: Airtight storage container
customer_reviews.text: Feels tight if only half full, feels a little loose when the container is full.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: This one is very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several other things to keep the air out of my stored coffee beans, but my family hates to hassle with closing them properly. This one is very easy to use, and so actually gets used properly. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: D Cazadora

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for need
customer_reviews.text: Strong, clear and easy to use. Perfect sizes for smaller quantities. Not easily scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara White

customer_reviews.title: Really Is Airtight!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing fresh coffee beans! Purchased a second jar because I was so pleased with the seal.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Plunger breaks too fast
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea but top broke a little more than month after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Weber

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Handle
customer_reviews.text: The handle broke off after one month of daily use. Very disappointed because before that it worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and so far the quality is satisfactory. The lid appears to squeeze all of the air out. It seems a little too pricey though.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I only use this for coffee beans. I can definitely tell there's a difference in freshness.
customer_reviews.author: nick brydels

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic product. It is well constructed and simple to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. It is well constructed and simple to use. I liked it so much I got another one!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Humphries

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use, aesthetically pleasing, keeps coffee beans fresh
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely easy to use because of its excellent design, which is also aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Pell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Keeps my coffee beans fresh. Looks great, to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Lina E.

customer_reviews.title: great product, looks great and works like a charm ...
customer_reviews.text: great product, looks great and works like a charm for storing smaller portions of freshly roasted coffee beans. A must have if you want fresh coffee.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: and i love it.
customer_reviews.text: The lid does not fit tight on this larger canister.. I purchased this same item only smaller, and i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke
customer_reviews.text: Product was great for 3 days then the handle broke. I used it once a day for 3 days before the handle completely broke apart.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Fruit

product_meta.title: Prepara Evak Fresh Saver Airless Canister, Glass & Stainless, Medium, Soft Touch Black Handle
product_meta.description: Color:Soft Touch Black Handle| Size:MediumAir takes out the freshness, EVAK takes out the air! The longer your food is exposed to air, the faster it loses flavor. Glass containers with air-tight lids are readily available, but they trap stale air in with your precious food. Evacuate the air and keep your food fresher and longer with EVAK glass storage containers by Prepara. Scientifically tested. Our Evak container was tested against the leading brand of storage container and there was no comparison. The Evak locked in flavors for longer and kept contents fresher. Still not convinced?...try one- we have a 5 year guarantee for satisfaction and quality. We are sure you'll love it. It's so simple- just push down, then pull up; no buttons or levers. Perfect for coffee, tea, cereal, dried fruits, granola, herbs, spices, confections, etc. The twin valve system automatically forces the air out as you push down the lid, and allows you to easily pull up and remove the lid to access contents. Designed in the USA by a very prolific team, famous for many household 'must-have' tools and gadgets EVAK Was funded on Kickstarter in just 2 days. Evak has since gone on to win numerous awards and accolades for its functionality and beauty. You can see Evaks in use at some very discerning restaurants and coffee roasters, including Michelin starred restaurant Daniel and at La Columbe coffee roasters…why not on your counter too! Awarded the number 1 choice 'best storage containers to keep food fresh' by both Good Housekeeping and Progressive Grocer. ***NOTE: Need the perfect measuring spoon to complement your Evak? we sell that too. Available in two sizes, beautifully made in stainless steel. Designed to hang tidily and always to hand on the rim of the container. Just paste this into the search bar: B00UMXUNSO
feature_bullets: TRULY AIRTIGHT, SIMPLY INTUITIVE. Evak is a patented, fully functional innovation. Just push down on the 'lid' and the air is evacuated from the container. Lid acts as a plunger, hear the satisfying whoosh as the air is displaced.

FRESHER LONGER. Scientifically proven to keep your coffee flavor locked into the container. Air is the enemy of your food, coffee or tea. The Evak lid has a twin valve system that allows air to be released, while keeping the container firmly closed off. No switches, pumps or levers needed and best yet, valves never need replacing.

RESISTS ODORS AND STAINS. Our Evak is built to the highest standards, only heavy duty borosilicate glass and stainless touch your food, coffee or tea. Glass is dishwasher safe and stainless cap and lid are hand wash for best care and longevity. Don't accept substitutes that use thin glass and inferior build quality.

GREAT LOOKING PRODUCT. Crystal clear and solidly built, the Evak stores conveniently and looks great on any counter or pantry, a beautiful complement to most kitchen décor. The Evak has now won 4 Internationally recognized awards for its cosmetic design and its practical functionality.

AVAILABLE IN 3 SIZES to suit your needs and 4 color choices. Large: holds 1 lb of coffee, 46 oz, 5.75 cups, 1.4 qt , 1.36 liter, Size 3.6 in DIA X 10 inches Medium: holds 1/2 lb of coffee, 24 oz, 3 cups, 0.75 qt, 709 ml SIZE 3.6 in DIA X 5.75 inches Small: holds 16oz, 2 cups, 0.5 qt, 468 ml SIZE 3.6 in DIA X 3.8 inches.
